pma:database.name: sensors
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `devices_list` ( `ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `DEVICEKEY` longtext NOT NULL, `DEVICELOC` longtext NOT NULL, `DEVICETEMPCALIB` float NOT NULL, `DEVICEHUMCALIB` float NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
